reviewText: Love this movie it needs to be on dvd
Not the Mary & Carol Higgins Clark movie, this one features Lauren Holly. Very misleading.
Movie is what is pictured in the site. Should habe looked more carefully.
I think the idea of someone (dressed as Santa) just shows how some people will take advantage of people at that great time of year.  I enjoyed this movie and LOVED the characters.

Spoiler Alert, the neighbor is "Santa."  But for me he mostly comes off as a thoughtless and inconsiderate individual, making you wonder why the film's characters like him.  There's occasional warmer moments, but not enough to make it a happy Christmas film.  Apparently Santa is a costly but effective marketing seasonal employee at the toy factory.  There just didn't seem to be a whole lot of point to telling the story this way.  Whatever Christmas message was intended, it was jumbled up and mostly hard to find.  I like the idea of Santa being unconventional, but he should still be nice.
Not my favorite lifetime movie, but it was cute.
